pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Wrapper for the 'Bit.ly', 'Goo.gl' and 'Is.gd' URL Shortening Services // Allows using different URL shortening services, which also provide expanding and analytic functions. Specifically developed for 'Bit.ly', 'Goo.gl' (both OAuth2) and 'is.gd' (no API key). Others can be added by request.
